description:
# Marta Paes - The Streaming Mindset with Apache Flink

An important (but often overlooked) step in the adoption of streaming is getting into the right “state of mind”.

What changes, and what trade-offs are you forced to make? How do you get there?

In this session, we’ll explore some challenges behind this transition, drawing on personal experience moving from a batch-heavy past to the future of streaming with Apache Flink.

## About Marta
Marta is a Developer Advocate at Ververica and a contributor to Apache Flink. Before finding her mojo in open source, she worked as a Data Warehouse Engineer at Zalando and Accenture. Follow her @morsapaes for all things data, bikes and beer.

# Panel discussion participants to follow

# Introducing our *NEW* sponsors!

Storm Consultancy

Storm works with startups, scale ups and corporate innovators to design and build world-class web apps, digital platforms and websites.
Storm is here to see your digital business idea or project through from initial brainstorm to launch (and beyond!).

We're your technology partner, your sounding board and your business confidant. We're fully invested. We build partnerships and enjoy nothing more than celebrating your success.
title: BRISTECH BYTESIZE #11: MARTA PAES - THE STREAMING MINDSET & APACHE FLINK
